settings.title: MISSION STATEMENT
settings.description:
Aiming to release your skin from impurities of life’s challenges, our products are formulated
                            for each skin type in mind with a combination of organic materials. Our three R’s to infuse
                            the skin’s barrier are replenish, refine, and renew, the Dyutih in you.

settings.title: VISION STATEMENT
settings.description:
With your mind, body, and a simplistic beauty ritual in mind, we strive for you to have your
                            inner beauty be reflected on your outward self each day, one droplet at a time. Take the
                            time to rebuild your outer-glow, as self-care is now your new priority.
